column1: good length, nipping away from a length, beats him as he prods from the crease
beaten again, pushing half forward at a good length outswinger
fuller on leg, no swing, he clips it neatly to mid on who is on the circle
good length, wide of off, he leaves this alone
fuller outside off, hint of shape, he checks a drive straight to cover
beaten by a back of a length delivery that just shaped away late
flash and miss trying to cut off the front foot. Was quite close to cut
short ball, chest high, he miscues a pull, it might have held in the surface, gets it off the toe to midwicket
good length, angled across, he opens the face and runs this to third man
fuller on leg, he checks a drive to mid on
shorter length angled across, he angles the bat to glide to third man and Lalor does well to prevent a second run
145kph, short and wide, he cuts hard in the air, just wide of backward point to wide third man
beaten trying to run this to third man from the crease
walks at the bowler and thumps a flat drive through the line back over the bowler's head! Dismissive stroke. Superb execution
cut magnificently through backward point! The shimmy down the previous ball created the shorter leg and he thumps it through backward point

appeal for a bizarre catch at slip! Given not out! He got an inside edge by the looks onto back thigh, Peirson dives to take a one handed catch but it popped out his glove as he hit the ground but bounced up to Burns at slip. But it was given not out!
good length, top of off, he defends
length ball, he plays a front foot pull to mid on, he wants a single but is sent back
full and wide, he clears the front leg and slices a square drive high over point to the long boundary. Lalor does well on the rope to save a run
shorter length, into the thigh guard, it rolls away behind square
caught behind! 138kph, short ball, climbs at his throat, he leans back to run it up and over slip but just ran it off the face of the bat to the keeper. Easy catch for Peirson
full on off, he pushes a drive to mid on and takes on Lynn for a single
141kph, back of a length on off, he is squared up a touch defending to point
shorter and some width, 142kph, he's back and cutting, didn't nail it but found the gap forward of point
95kph, pushed through on off, he skips out and pushes to mid on and pinches a single
quicker ball, sliding through on leg, he gives room and gets a thick inside edge that runs square
he jumps out early, it's a length ball and he defends
tossed up and he skips down and tees off lofting to the sightscreen! Lovely swing of the bat. That was in the slot
pushed through on off, he defends on the front foot
flatter, he jumps out and defends
angled down leg and he glances this wide of short fine! Too straight from Lalor and Marsh picked it off
fuller, he slices this on the drive in the air but it's short of Lynn
short and wide, 112kph, slower ball, it sits up and he smashes a cut shot through cover, Heazlett is stretched on the rope but he makes an excellent save coming from deep point
slower ball, he gets leg side but mistimes a cut to cover-point
short slower ball, it grips and bounces, he tries to pull, gets through the shot and it comes off the back of the bat and drops down
slower ball into the hip, he clips this neatly behind square for a couple
fired full and straight, he steps inside the line and scoops this fine! Brilliant He read the quicker ball and he plays that shot so well
fuller on off, he drives to long on
99kph fired into leg, he clips it wide of long on for two
tossed up outside off, he slices a drive towards long off
fired into off, he skips out and whips this to deep midwicket
shorter length, he's back and whipping this forward of square
shorter length, 124kph, he chops this off an inside edge onto the pitch

caught and bowled! The bat flew further than the ball! Quicker short ball, he tried to pull but was hurried, it hit high on the bat and popped up, he let go of the bat and it flew away to square leg, Laughlin ran forward in his follow through and took the catch easily
good length angled into off, 140kph, he works this with the angle wide of fine leg for two
short ball, he is back in a flash and playing a textbook pull shot, hammering it forward of square and beats the sweeper!
good length on off, he defends on the front foot to cover
good length, off stump, he defends to cover-point
an appeal for a catch down the leg side and it's called wide! It came off the pad clearly
fuller on off, he skips out and drives to long on
shorter off break, he gets an inside edge trying to drive on the up
wider and fuller, he square drives to deep point
an appeal for lbw, given not out. That was close. He shuffled a fair way across
fuller on off, he drives back to the bowler
he skips down to a full ball and gets an inside edge onto pad and it runs fine
slower ball on leg, he clips this forward of square into the gap for two
short slower ball on leg, he gives room and late cuts through backward point for a couple
beaten on the inside edge as he backed away. He followed him

caught at a catching forward square! 117kph, short ball he whacked a pull shot flat and straight to Burns who had been moved specifically there in a catching position. Could not have picked him out better if he tried and Burns took the sharp chance
back of a length on off, he defends
beaten, squared up by a back of a length ball outside off

slower ball, outside off, he lofts a drive past cover, de Villiers has a long chase and makes an excellent diving save. Phenomenal superman type save. Oh no it's flicked his pants after he reeled it in as he was diving over the rope. It's called four!
angled into leg, he clips this behind square to the man in the deep
137kph, into the hip, he glances this wide of fine leg and they run well for two
141kph, good length on off, he's back and defending
back of a length on off, he's back and defending to midwicket
shorter length, he's back and across, working this to midwicket, the fielder underarms unnecessarily at the non striker's but no one was backing up so they give up a single
back of a length outside off, he mistimes a punch to cover
118kph slower ball wide of off, he tries to loft down the ground but mistimes to long on
slower ball, shorter on off, he's back and knocking this to mid on
flat batted over long on! Short ball outside off, he stood tall and smashed it flat and hard over long on. What a strike

dropped over the long off rope by de Villiers! This was sliced to long off, de Villiers was on the run, timed his jump but it wasn't that high and he probably didn't need to, it burst through his hands and went over the rope! A rare mistake from ABdV. He might have been thinking he needed to throw it back
short ball, he swings hard and balloons a top edge towards long on but it doesn't carry
short slower ball, he slaps a pull through midwicket
full and wide, he square drives off a thick outside wide of short third man and it runs away!
117kph, slower ball, on off, he's back and turning this behind square
slower ball pushed way wide of off and called
full on middle, he crunches a drive to long on along the ground
slower ball, outside off, he tries to pull but it stays a touch low
full on off, he drives back to the bowler
good length outside off, he gives room and slaps this to deep point
123kph, slower ball down leg, he glances fine and Peirson makes an excellent save on the bounce
full on leg, he clips this to deep square

caught at deep forward square by Heazlett! Short slower ball, Sutherland takes it on but he was hitting to the long boundary, he got under, Heazlett sits under it, 20 metres in from the rope and takes the catch well
shorter into the hip, he tucks to forward square who is now inside the circle
short ball, chest high, he hammers a pull shot behind square to the sweeper
short ball wide of off, he pulls from outside off to deep forward square
angled down the leg side and called wide
length ball, on off, he drives inside out to deep point
slower ball outside off, 112kph, he picks it and lofts this high over wide long on! Powerful strike
good length, on off, he defends from the crease to cover for a single
139kph, back of a length outside off, he's back and running this to third man
back of a length, on leg, he's back and forcing this to long on
darted into off, he's back and working this forward of square
fired into leg, he's back and tucking this to square leg, he's weighted it well to pick up two
fired into the wicket, cramping him, he punches this to long on
skips out and works this to midwicket, they take on Burns who fires and misses but Webster was home
shout for lbw as he tried to paddle sweep but it was given not out. Maybe on height
102kph, shorter length, he's back and punching this wide of long on
124kph, wide slower ball, he square drives and chops it down into the off side
fuller, he drives to long on
full in the slot and he hammers a drive flat down the ground and it thumps into the sightscreen on the bounce!

caught and bowled! Cutting takes a good catch under the sky ball. This was a wider length slower ball, he tried to loft across the line, got a top edge that flew straight up, Cutting ran to his right and took a good catch moving with the flight
133kph, low full toss, he deliberately slices this past short third man! Clever shot
length slower ball, 113kph, he's back and slapping this to deep cover-point
124kph, slower ball follows him as he backs away, he's taken on the thigh pad and it rolls away for an extra
130kph, angled into leg stump, he stays leg side and pushes it to cover
130kph, fuller outside off, he pushes towards mid off but Laughlin dives full stretch to his left to save a run
129kph, full yorker, he squeezes this to mid off on the circle
bowled him! 123kph, good length on middle, Christian got in a real tangle, stepping leg side trying to slice it square through point. He missed, Laughlin hit middle
good length on middle, he pushes this towards long on
slower ball on off, he's back and pushing this to backward point
slower ball on off, he swings hard but misses and it goes over off
another swing and miss at a length slower ball wide of off
normal speed in the slot and he nails this high and long over midwicket! That went 92m over the long boundary. What a strike
wide yorker and he deliberately slices this over the short boundary at third man! Excellent skill to get it there. That was deliberate
length ball wide of off, he slaps a square drive to deep point
length ball, he clears the front leg and smears this hard wide of long on and Cutting can't make the save! That was hit hard but it probably should have been saved
angled down the leg side and it's called wide
full and wide, and again it's called wide. Outside the guidelines
shorter slower ball, he's back and uppercutting over short third man and they get three
short ball and he clubs a pull shot over deep square! That was pounded and the young ball boy takes the catch over the rope
he backs outside leg, it's speared down leg and goes between his legs, Peirson dives and gets a touch to prevent four byes
full on leg, he drives hard to long on
full on leg stump, he whips to deep midwicket, Patel is tested trying to run two and the throw is wide so he gets there
swinging into the thigh pad, he flicks this fine with ease! There was swing but it swing down leg and was tucked away
short ball, 132kph, he swivels and pulls powerfully down behind square!
131kph, back of a length, he stands up and punches this to cover-point
130kph, shorter length outside off, he sits back and runs this down to third man
133kph, full and swinging away, he frees the arms and slaps a drive over cover! It did slow towards the rope but it got there
128kph, good length outswinger, he leaves
angled into leg, he's back and working this to short fine
tossed up outside leg, he ropes a sweep shot hard behind square and nails it to the rope!
short drag down and he pulls hard behind square for four more!
pushed through outside off, he tries to cut but is beaten for pace
crunches a sweep behind square! Fuller on off, he was down quickly and smoking this behind square
fuller on middle, he clips this neatly along the ground to long on
128kph, shorter length, he pulls in the air behind square but it falls short of the man now placed on the rope
full and straight, 133kph, he defends to cover
he charges a length ball, takes a big swipe and gets a thick inside edge that runs fine for four! Unlucky for Wildermuth there
137kph, bouncer, over middle, he ducks under it
another inside edge just past leg! 138kph, good length delivery that nips in off the seam, he drives and gets a thin inside edge that just misses the stumps and runs away
good length on leg, he clips this off the front foot wide of mid on
launched over long on! This was length on middle, he stayed leg side and launched this over long on
hit even further over midwicket into the upper deck! A step hit in his arc and he whacks it 110 metres!
he backs outside leg, he spears this wide of off and Lynn leaves it
full and wide and he slaps this over cover! Raw power from Lynn
full toss just deposited over the sightscreen! That was like range hitting practice!
slower off break on leg, he's back and tapping this to the gap at midwicket, perfectly weighted to pick up two
good length wide of off, he mistimes a drive to point
134kph, good length outside off, he opens up and drives powerfully through cover!
short ball, top edges a pull shot over fine leg into the crowd! This wasn't controlled but fine leg was up and it's the short boundary
short and wide, he leans back and late cuts with east between short third man and backward point!
135kph, full outside off, he mistimed a drive off the inside edge
full outside off, he crunches a square drive to deep point
shorter length, he's back and mistiming a pull shot forward of square
dropped by Wildermuth running back from point! He charged and sliced a wide ball high over backward point, Wildermuth made good ground running back, got both hands to it diving but spilt it
full on off, he drives powerfully back to the bowler
length ball on off, he tries to heave this to midwicket and mistimes through square leg
134kph, length ball outside off, he clears the front leg and clubs this flat wide of mid on! He didn't get it. If he did it was six

caught at deep wide long on! Slightly shorter, he tries to go over long on again, he didn't quite get it, Harris has to run around from deep midwicket to his left and he takes an excellent running catch
leg break tossed up on middle, he works this wide of long on to the gap and calls for two straight away

Bowled him! Beautiful leg break! Tossed up and it drifts outside leg, de Villiers gives room to go inside out over cover, it gripped and turned sharply to hit the top of off! The air went out of the Gabba. But that was a superb piece of bowling

caught at slip! Brilliant bowling and captaincy! Tossed up wrong un, perfect length, enticed a loose drive on the up, takes the edge and it goes straight to Marsh at slip! Easy knee high catch and he's on a hat-trick!
shorter length, he's back and cutting to deep point
shorter length, he's back and across and working this behind square
flatter and quicker on middle, he's back and defending
short and wide, he runs a late cut down to third man
shorter on the hip, 138kph, he's back and glancing this to fine leg
full and wide, he climbs into a square drive hammering this to deep point
shorter bouncer, outside off, 133kph, he ducks under it
fuller on off, he plays a textbook drive to cover
134kph, back of a length, he's squared up and defending
leg break outside off, he drives to deep cover
short and wide, some turn, he cuts to deep cover and they pick two as the man was deep on the rope
tossed up on middle, he defends on the front foot
pushed through on middle, he mistimes to cover and they take on Harris and sneak through
shorter and spinning down leg but he misses out, taken on the pad trying to pull fine
shorter on off, he gives room and cuts hard to deep point
attempted sweep and he's taken on the pad but he's hit outside the line of leg
shorter into the hip, he's back and tucking this through square leg
angled into the hip, he tucks this to short fine
pushed through on off, he's back and late cutting neatly with the angle for a couple to bring up his 50. A very good half-century for Heazlett
shorter on middle, he's back and punching this to long on
angled into leg, he's back and working this to a gap at deep midwicket for two
tossed up outside off, he skips down and lofts this up and over cover, he didn't time it but gets two
tossed up outside leg, he sweeps hard but straight to short fine
attempted reverse sweep, taken on pad, huge lbw shout, umpire says missing off on the angle. Looks a good call
charges at a length ball, didn't pick it, slices a drive to backward point
tossed up outside off, he leans out to defend
tossed up on leg, he dances down and drives to long on
short slower ball, he pulls this nicely behind square for a couple
slower ball wide of off, he sits back and runs this to third man
fuller on off, he drives inside out to deep cover
good length, fourth stump line, he's back and working this to midwicket
short ball wide of off, quicker, he tries to cut but misses, beaten by the pace
bouncer, head high, he gets inside it and pulls to fine leg
darted into middle, he's back and forcing to point
fired down leg, he sweeps off the top edge and it pops up safely to short fine leg

caught behind! A little edge trying to late cut! It was pushed through from around the wicket, it slid on straighter, he tried to run it fine, got a little tickle and Harper took the catch well after a slight juggle
caught and bowled! A soft dismissal. Tossed up on off, it might have held in a surface a touch but he just chipped a drive back to Patel. Easy catch for him. He's a hat-trick
shorter on off, he's back and punching this to long off

Burns is run out in a mix up! It was tossed up outside off, Burns just defended it to cover and called yes immediately, it was to the left of Harris who is a right hander and not a sharp fielder, Cutting sent him back, Burns had to turn around, Harris got to ball and had to spin around to throw, the throw was high but Harper had time to take the bails off as Burns was well out!

good length, on off, he pushes towards mid off, Wildermuth slides coming across from midwicket and takes out a huge bit of turf with his knee! That turf was loose. He is OK but that could have been nasty.
slower ball bouncer outside off, he tries to pull and misses
123kph, length ball outside off, he backs away and slices this in the air wide of mid off and picks the gap!

Given lbw! The umpire wasn't going to give it and then he did! This was missing leg by some margin! He walked down the wicket, it was a slower ball inswinger, he might have even got an inside edge but it was swinging a long way as it hit the pad. It was given out and Cutting was furious
good length wide off, he tries to drive and missed
caught behind! Back of a length outside off, this climbs off a length, he's trying to run it to third man but it got big on him, gets a thin edge through to Harper! This is staggering
tossed up on middle, he leans out to defend
floated higher, he drives and gets a thick edge to backward point
shorter length, he's back and defending to cover
shorter length, he's back and cutting this to backward point, Wildermuth misfields and they nearly panic and try for a second

Bowled him! Played for spin that wasn't there! This was floated up on off, it was a top spinner, he tried to work to leg thinking it was a leg break, he closed the face, was beaten on the outside edge and it hit the top of off!

LBW! Renegades win! Incredible! Tossed up on leg, he tried to sweep, it pitched and spun and got him on the front pad infront of middle, the umpire put his finger up after a big appeal and the Renegades celebrate!
